rows.label: tlk70000010_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Ever since we lost our mother, I've had
to be a mum of sorts to Chalcy.

rows.label: tlk70000010_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I've tried to do what I can to care
for him, but I'm no replacement for
the real thing.

rows.label: tlk70000010_04_msg0003
rows.name:
He's gotten pretty big now, anyway.
Doesn't need me so much. Gives me a
real bittersweet feeling to think on it.

rows.label: tlk70000010_04_msg0004
rows.name:
But, I mean, he's turning into a really
promising young man, and a great
member of the team.

rows.label: tlk70000010_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes, with Chalcy by my side, I feel
much stronger. Invincible! He's my
rock. That will never change!

rows.label: tlk70000010_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh..Laura! I nearly forgot...
Thank you so much!
